Interface Shape


  • public interface Shape
    The shape interface has the basic abstract methods for shapes such as circles or squares.
    Version:
    3/26/19
    Author:
    Guy Wilks

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getArea() 
      double getPerimeter() 
      int numberOfSides() 

    • Method Detail

      • getArea

        double getArea()
        Returns:
        returns the area of a shape.

      • getPerimeter

        double getPerimeter()
        Returns:
        returns the perimeter of a shape.

      • numberOfSides

        int numberOfSides()
        Returns:
        returns the number of sides of a shape. If the shape is a circle it will return Integer.MAX_VALUE
